name: @peculiar/attestation-cli
description: Provides Console Line Interface to verify the HSM attestations

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:types && npm run build:cli
scripts.build:cli:
mkdir -p bin && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node
require("../build/cjs/main.js");' > bin/kms-attestation && chmod +x bin/kms-attestation

author: PeculiarVentures
